55 
56 mesh_filter::MeshFilterBase::MeshFilterBase(const TransformCallback& transform_callback,
57  const SensorModel::Parameters& sensor_parameters,
58  const std::string& render_vertex_shader,
59  const std::string& render_fragment_shader,
60  const std::string& filter_vertex_shader,
61  const std::string& filter_fragment_shader)
62  : sensor_parameters_(sensor_parameters.clone())
63  , next_handle_(FIRST_LABEL) // 0 and 1 are reserved!
64  , min_handle_(FIRST_LABEL)
65  , stop_(false)
66  , transform_callback_(transform_callback)
67  , padding_scale_(1.0)
68  , padding_offset_(0.01)
69  , shadow_threshold_(0.5)
70 {
71  filter_thread_ = std::thread(std::bind(&MeshFilterBase::run, this, render_vertex_shader, render_fragment_shader,
72  filter_vertex_shader, filter_fragment_shader));
73 }
74 
75 void mesh_filter::MeshFilterBase::initialize(const std::string& render_vertex_shader,
76  const std::string& render_fragment_shader,
77  const std::string& filter_vertex_shader,
78  const std::string& filter_fragment_shader)
79 {
80  mesh_renderer_ = std::make_shared<GLRenderer>(sensor_parameters_->getWidth(), sensor_parameters_->getHeight(),
81  sensor_parameters_->getNearClippingPlaneDistance(),
82  sensor_parameters_->getFarClippingPlaneDistance());
83  depth_filter_ = std::make_shared<GLRenderer>(sensor_parameters_->getWidth(), sensor_parameters_->getHeight(),
84  sensor_parameters_->getNearClippingPlaneDistance(),
85  sensor_parameters_->getFarClippingPlaneDistance());
86 
87  mesh_renderer_->setShadersFromString(render_vertex_shader, render_fragment_shader);
88  depth_filter_->setShadersFromString(filter_vertex_shader, filter_fragment_shader);
89 
90  depth_filter_->begin();
91 
92  glGenTextures(1, &sensor_depth_texture_);
93 
94  glUniform1i(glGetUniformLocation(depth_filter_->getProgramID(), "sensor"), 0);
95  glUniform1i(glGetUniformLocation(depth_filter_->getProgramID(), "depth"), 2);
96  glUniform1i(glGetUniformLocation(depth_filter_->getProgramID(), "label"), 4);
97 
98  shadow_threshold_location_ = glGetUniformLocation(depth_filter_->getProgramID(), "shadow_threshold");
99 
100  depth_filter_->end();
101 
102  canvas_ = glGenLists(1);
103  glNewList(canvas_, GL_COMPILE);
104  glBegin(GL_QUADS);
105 
106  glColor3f(1, 1, 1);
107  glTexCoord2f(0, 0);
108  glVertex3f(-1, -1, 1);
109 
110  glTexCoord2f(1, 0);
111  glVertex3f(1, -1, 1);
112 
113  glTexCoord2f(1, 1);
114  glVertex3f(1, 1, 1);
115 
116  glTexCoord2f(0, 1);
117  glVertex3f(-1, 1, 1);
118 
119  glEnd();
120  glEndList();
121 }
122 
123 mesh_filter::MeshFilterBase::~MeshFilterBase()
124 {
125  {
126  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lock(jobs_mutex_);
127  stop_ = true;
128  while (!jobs_queue_.empty())
129  {
130  jobs_queue_.front()->cancel();
131  jobs_queue_.pop();
132  }
133  }
134  jobs_condition_.notify_one();
135  filter_thread_.join();
136 }
137 
138 void mesh_filter::MeshFilterBase::addJob(const JobPtr& job) const
139 {
140  {
141  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> _(jobs_mutex_);
142  jobs_queue_.push(job);
143  }
144  jobs_condition_.notify_one();
145 }
146 
147 void mesh_filter::MeshFilterBase::deInitialize()
148 {
149  glDeleteLists(canvas_, 1);
150  glDeleteTextures(1, &sensor_depth_texture_);
151 
152  meshes_.clear();
153  mesh_renderer_.reset();
154  depth_filter_.reset();
155 }
156 
157 void mesh_filter::MeshFilterBase::setSize(unsigned int width, unsigned int height)
158 {
159  mesh_renderer_->setBufferSize(width, height);
160  mesh_renderer_->setCameraParameters(width, width, width >> 1, height >> 1);
161 
162  depth_filter_->setBufferSize(width, height);
163  depth_filter_->setCameraParameters(width, width, width >> 1, height >> 1);
164 }
165 
166 void mesh_filter::MeshFilterBase::setTransformCallback(const TransformCallback& transform_callback)
167 {
168  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> _(transform_callback_mutex_);
169  transform_callback_ = transform_callback;
170 }
171 
172 mesh_filter::MeshHandle mesh_filter::MeshFilterBase::addMesh(const shapes::Mesh& mesh)
173 {
174  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> _(meshes_mutex_);
175 
176  JobPtr job(new FilterJob<void>(std::bind(&MeshFilterBase::addMeshHelper, this, next_handle_, &mesh)));
177  addJob(job);
178  job->wait();
179  mesh_filter::MeshHandle ret = next_handle_;
180  const std::size_t sz = min_handle_ + meshes_.size() + 1;
181  for (std::size_t i = min_handle_; i < sz; ++i)
182  if (meshes_.find(i) == meshes_.end())
183  {
184  next_handle_ = i;
185  break;
186  }
187  min_handle_ = next_handle_;
188  return ret;
189 }
190 
191 void mesh_filter::MeshFilterBase::addMeshHelper(MeshHandle handle, const shapes::Mesh* cmesh)
192 {
193  meshes_[handle] = std::make_shared<GLMesh>(*cmesh, handle);
194 }
195 
196 void mesh_filter::MeshFilterBase::removeMesh(MeshHandle handle)
197 {
198  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> _(meshes_mutex_);
199  FilterJob<bool>* remover = new FilterJob<bool>(std::bind(&MeshFilterBase::removeMeshHelper, this, handle));
200  JobPtr job(remover);
201  addJob(job);
202  job->wait();
203 
204  if (!remover->getResult())
205  throw std::runtime_error("Could not remove mesh. Mesh not found!");
206  min_handle_ = std::min(handle, min_handle_);
207 }
208 
209 bool mesh_filter::MeshFilterBase::removeMeshHelper(MeshHandle handle)
210 {
211  std::size_t erased = meshes_.erase(handle);
212  return (erased != 0);
213 }

215 void mesh_filter::MeshFilterBase::setShadowThreshold(float threshold)
216 {
217  shadow_threshold_ = threshold;
218 }

220 void mesh_filter::MeshFilterBase::getModelLabels(LabelType* labels) const
221 {
222  JobPtr job(new FilterJob<void>(std::bind(&GLRenderer::getColorBuffer, mesh_renderer_.get(), (unsigned char*)labels)));
223  addJob(job);
224  job->wait();
225 }
226 
227 void mesh_filter::MeshFilterBase::getModelDepth(float* depth) const
228 {
229  JobPtr job1(new FilterJob<void>(std::bind(&GLRenderer::getDepthBuffer, mesh_renderer_.get(), depth)));
230  JobPtr job2(new FilterJob<void>(
231  std::bind(&SensorModel::Parameters::transformModelDepthToMetricDepth, sensor_parameters_.get(), depth)));
232  {
233  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lock(jobs_mutex_);
234  jobs_queue_.push(job1);
235  jobs_queue_.push(job2);
236  }
237  jobs_condition_.notify_one();
238  job1->wait();
239  job2->wait();
240 }
241 
242 void mesh_filter::MeshFilterBase::getFilteredDepth(float* depth) const
243 {
244  JobPtr job1(new FilterJob<void>(std::bind(&GLRenderer::getDepthBuffer, depth_filter_.get(), depth)));
245  JobPtr job2(new FilterJob<void>(
246  std::bind(&SensorModel::Parameters::transformFilteredDepthToMetricDepth, sensor_parameters_.get(), depth)));
247  {
248  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lock(jobs_mutex_);
249  jobs_queue_.push(job1);
250  jobs_queue_.push(job2);
251  }
252  jobs_condition_.notify_one();
253  job1->wait();
254  job2->wait();
255 }
256 
257 void mesh_filter::MeshFilterBase::getFilteredLabels(LabelType* labels) const
258 {
259  JobPtr job(new FilterJob<void>(std::bind(&GLRenderer::getColorBuffer, depth_filter_.get(), (unsigned char*)labels)));
260  addJob(job);
261  job->wait();
262 }
263 
264 void mesh_filter::MeshFilterBase::run(const std::string& render_vertex_shader,
265  const std::string& render_fragment_shader,
266  const std::string& filter_vertex_shader,
267  const std::string& filter_fragment_shader)
268 {
269  initialize(render_vertex_shader, render_fragment_shader, filter_vertex_shader, filter_fragment_shader);
270 
271  while (!stop_)
272  {
273  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lock(jobs_mutex_);
274  // check if we have new sensor data to be processed. If not, wait until we get notified.
275  if (jobs_queue_.empty())
276  jobs_condition_.wait(lock);
277 
278  if (!jobs_queue_.empty())
279  {
280  JobPtr job = jobs_queue_.front();
281  jobs_queue_.pop();
282  lock.unlock();
283  job->execute();
284  lock.lock();
285  }
286  }
287  deInitialize();
288 }
289 
290 void mesh_filter::MeshFilterBase::filter(const void* sensor_data, GLushort type, bool wait) const
291 {
292  if (type != GL_FLOAT && type != GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT)
293  {
294  std::stringstream msg;
295  msg << "unknown type \"" << type << "\". Allowed values are GL_FLOAT or GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT.";
296  throw std::runtime_error(msg.str());
297  }
298 
299  JobPtr job(new FilterJob<void>(std::bind(&MeshFilterBase::doFilter, this, sensor_data, type)));
300  addJob(job);
301  if (wait)
302  job->wait();
303 }
304 
305 void mesh_filter::MeshFilterBase::doFilter(const void* sensor_data, const int encoding) const
306 {
307  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> _(transform_callback_mutex_);
308 
309  mesh_renderer_->begin();
310  sensor_parameters_->setRenderParameters(*mesh_renderer_);
311 
312  glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
313  glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
314  glDepthFunc(GL_LESS);
315  glEnable(GL_CULL_FACE);
316  glCullFace(GL_FRONT);
317  glDisable(GL_ALPHA_TEST);
318  glDisable(GL_BLEND);
319 
320  GLuint padding_coefficients_id = glGetUniformLocation(mesh_renderer_->getProgramID(), "padding_coefficients");
321  Eigen::Vector3f padding_coefficients =
322  sensor_parameters_->getPaddingCoefficients() * padding_scale_ + Eigen::Vector3f(0, 0, padding_offset_);
323  glUniform3f(padding_coefficients_id, padding_coefficients[0], padding_coefficients[1], padding_coefficients[2]);
324 
325  Eigen::Isometry3d transform;
326  for (const std::pair<const MeshHandle, GLMeshPtr>& mesh : meshes_)
327  if (transform_callback_(mesh.first, transform))
328  mesh.second->render(transform);
329 
330  mesh_renderer_->end();
331 
332  // now filter the depth_map with the second rendering stage
333  // depth_filter_.setBufferSize (width, height);
334  // depth_filter_.setCameraParameters (fx, fy, cx, cy);
335  depth_filter_->begin();
336  sensor_parameters_->setFilterParameters(*depth_filter_);
337  glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
338  glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
339  glDepthFunc(GL_ALWAYS);
340  glDisable(GL_CULL_FACE);
341  glDisable(GL_ALPHA_TEST);
342  glDisable(GL_BLEND);
343 
344  // glUniform1f (near_location_, depth_filter_.getNearClippingDistance ());
345  // glUniform1f (far_location_, depth_filter_.getFarClippingDistance ());
346  glUniform1f(shadow_threshold_location_, shadow_threshold_);
347 
348  GLuint depth_texture = mesh_renderer_->getDepthTexture();
349  GLuint color_texture = mesh_renderer_->getColorTexture();
350 
351  // bind sensor depth
352  glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE0);
353  glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, sensor_depth_texture_);
354 
355  float scale =
356  1.0 / (sensor_parameters_->getFarClippingPlaneDistance() - sensor_parameters_->getNearClippingPlaneDistance());
357 
358  if (encoding == GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT)
359  // unsigned shorts shorts will be mapped to the range 0-1 during transfer. Afterwards we can apply another scale +
360  // offset to
361  // map the values between near and far clipping plane to 0 - 1. -> scale = (65535 * depth - near ) / (far - near)
362  // we have: [0 - 65535] -> [0 - 1]
363  // we want: [near - far] -> [0 - 1]
364  glPixelTransferf(GL_DEPTH_SCALE, scale * 65.535);
365  else
366  glPixelTransferf(GL_DEPTH_SCALE, scale);
367  glPixelTransferf(GL_DEPTH_BIAS, -scale * sensor_parameters_->getNearClippingPlaneDistance());
368 
369  glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT, sensor_parameters_->getWidth(), sensor_parameters_->getHeight(), 0,
370  GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT, encoding, sensor_data);
371  glTexParameterf(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
372  glTexParameterf(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
373  glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
374  glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
375 
376  // bind depth map
377  glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE2);
378  glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, depth_texture);
379 
380  // bind labels
381  glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE4);
382  glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, color_texture);
383  glCallList(canvas_);
384  depth_filter_->end();
385 }
